channel.title: Server connection error need help!
channel.description:
ok heres the thing when i first get my screen up to logg in my name on moparscape it works.then i used the :: thingy and after awhile it says "error connecting to server must be down click cancel then start over to make your own" i did what he said and evertiem i try it its says same thing i wanna know why it keeps lagging and kicking me off my game because i want to play just me on a server that no one else is on
CAN SOME1 PLEASE TELL ME WHAT TO DO THAT MIGHT HELP ME WITH THIS PROBLEM ANYTHING WILL BE APPREICTAED

item.title: Server connection error need help!
item.dc:creator: @purez4life purez4life
item.description:
@purez4life wrote:

When you hit “Cancel” and then “Start Server” doesn’t that put it back to the I.P. 127.0.0.7? Maybe you got banned for using the :: thing? OR is your server? Because people can see your Chat Log of everything you typed. Try just pressing “Log In” again? I HOPE THIS HELPS. -Purez4life

Read full topic
